HASD.content: since promise is also an order, allegorical veil becomes political shield, solid barrier of a social division, a shibboleth
HASD.linkedContent: since promise is also an order, allegorical veil becomes political shield, solid barrier of a social division, a shibboleth

A.content: one should avoid wasting time speaking in shibboleths, passwords, unless it gains you time
A.linkedContent: one should avoid wasting time speaking in shibboleths, passwords, unless it gains you time

A.content: shibboleth effect, untranslatability (essential incompleteness of translation), borders of untranslatability w/in original language itself
A.linkedContent: shibboleth effect, untranslatability (essential incompleteness of translation), borders of untranslatability w/in original language itself

A.content: the 2 versions of aporia’s nonpassage: 1) impermeable, only opens via shibboleth, closed borders (i.e. during war) 2) impasse of no limit, limit too porous, no opposition btwn 2 sides
A.linkedContent: the 2 versions of aporia’s nonpassage: 1) impermeable, only opens via shibboleth, closed borders (i.e. during war) 2) impasse of no limit, limit too porous, no opposition btwn 2 sides

A.content: untranslatability of idiom can produce effects of shibboleth
A.linkedContent: untranslatability of idiom can produce effects of shibboleth

A.content: death always the name of a secret, signs irreplaceable singularity, puts forth common name of the proper name w/out name, always a shibboleth > language about death long history of a secret society, hidden religion of the awaiting, a universal Marrano
A.linkedContent: death always the name of a secret, signs irreplaceable singularity, puts forth common name of the proper name w/out name, always a shibboleth > language about death long history of a secret society, hidden religion of the awaiting, a universal Marrano

SH.content: in shibboleth (river), there’s suspension of meaning, almost opposite of phenomenological “epokhe,” which preserves meaning > those who couldn’t pronounce “shi” marked themselves as unable to remark a mark thus coded
SH.linkedContent: in shibboleth (river), there’s suspension of meaning, almost opposite of phenomenological “epokhe,” which preserves meaning > those who couldn’t pronounce “shi” marked themselves as unable to remark a mark thus coded

SH.content: date resembles shibboleth, gives ciphered access to secret configuration of places for memory
SH.linkedContent: date resembles shibboleth, gives ciphered access to secret configuration of places for memory

SH.content: a visa is a shibboleth, that determines a theme, meaning, a poem is too [is poem an unmastered secret?]—only to show the secret forever withdrawing
SH.linkedContent: a visa is a shibboleth, that determines a theme, meaning, a poem is too [is poem an unmastered secret?]—only to show the secret forever withdrawing

SH.content: shibboleth is the shibboleth for the right to the poem which calls itself a shibboleth, Shibboleth is its title
SH.linkedContent: shibboleth is the shibboleth for the right to the poem which calls itself a shibboleth, Shibboleth is its title

SH.content: no one meaning, from moment there’s a date & shibboleth
SH.linkedContent: no one meaning, from moment there’s a date & shibboleth

SH.content: shibboleth must be at your disposal to inhabit a language > one must be capable of it, of marking > a discriminating wherewithal > to know how to do as to know who to mark difference
SH.linkedContent: shibboleth must be at your disposal to inhabit a language > one must be capable of it, of marking > a discriminating wherewithal > to know how to do as to know who to mark difference

SH.content: shibboleth presupposes cultural alliance in the differential mark, a secret w/out secrecy, no meaning concealed in crypt
SH.linkedContent: shibboleth presupposes cultural alliance in the differential mark, a secret w/out secrecy, no meaning concealed in crypt

SH.content: ellipsis & caesura of discretion [Blanchot] inhabit the shibboleth (Joyce), it fascinates, seduces ——shibboleth as the cipher of the cipher: ciphered manifestation of the cipher, emerges from nonmeaning, and keeps itself in reserve
SH.linkedContent: ellipsis & caesura of discretion [Blanchot] inhabit the shibboleth (Joyce), it fascinates, seduces ——shibboleth as the cipher of the cipher: ciphered manifestation of the cipher, emerges from nonmeaning, and keeps itself in reserve

SH.content: cipher can conceal secret, which it shelters in its readability, w/out the slightest hidden attention > there’s nothing it can do about it [why/who interpret(s) secret as a taunting gesture?]
SH.linkedContent: cipher can conceal secret, which it shelters in its readability, w/out the slightest hidden attention > there’s nothing it can do about it [why/who interpret(s) secret as a taunting gesture?]

SH.content: Babel w/in a single language, shibboleth marks multiplicity in language, insignificant difference as condition of meaning
SH.linkedContent: Babel w/in a single language, shibboleth marks multiplicity in language, insignificant difference as condition of meaning

SH.content: shibboleth resists translation due to that w/in it that cuts nonsignifying difference in body, mark, written, oral
SH.linkedContent: shibboleth resists translation due to that w/in it that cuts nonsignifying difference in body, mark, written, oral

SH.content: shibboleth: river, ear of grain, olive twig
SH.linkedContent: shibboleth: river, ear of grain, olive twig

SH.content: from watch tower, sentinel of vigilance, one sees shibboleth’s value can, tragically, always be inverted
SH.linkedContent: from watch tower, sentinel of vigilance, one sees shibboleth’s value can, tragically, always be inverted

SH.content: tragic inversion of shibboleth, corruption of its differential value, from condition of alliance to discriminating limit, policing, normalization, methodical subjugation
SH.linkedContent: tragic inversion of shibboleth, corruption of its differential value, from condition of alliance to discriminating limit, policing, normalization, methodical subjugation

SH.content: shibboleth secures passage from one to other in difference, w/in sameness > ambiguities of French partage
SH.linkedContent: shibboleth secures passage from one to other in difference, w/in sameness > ambiguities of French partage

SH.content: [Freud’s use of shibboleth re: true psychoanalysts]
SH.linkedContent: [Freud’s use of shibboleth re: true psychoanalysts]

SH.content: the poem, folded and refolded in simplicity of the singular, a certain repetition makes readability possible > it signifies: there is shibboleth > there is something not shown: crypt, cipher > it speaks, the address takes place, permitting alliances, anniversaries, returns, even if there is no subsistent trace, scarcely ash
SH.linkedContent: the poem, folded and refolded in simplicity of the singular, a certain repetition makes readability possible > it signifies: there is shibboleth > there is something not shown: crypt, cipher > it speaks, the address takes place, permitting alliances, anniversaries, returns, even if there is no subsistent trace, scarcely ash

SH.content: unreadable is readable as unreadable, shibboleth transmitted to a few during finite time of incineration, heart to heart, mouth to ear, hand to hand, still universal by right (legible, coded, troped) > madness of fire: consumes a date from w/in > renders ash from 1st moment
SH.linkedContent: unreadable is readable as unreadable, shibboleth transmitted to a few during finite time of incineration, heart to heart, mouth to ear, hand to hand, still universal by right (legible, coded, troped) > madness of fire: consumes a date from w/in > renders ash from 1st moment

SH.content: shibboleth: “I am ash”
SH.linkedContent: shibboleth: “I am ash”

SH.content: shibboleth: the indecipherability btwn constative & performative, the untrue truth of truth, ashes in truth
SH.linkedContent: shibboleth: the indecipherability btwn constative & performative, the untrue truth of truth, ashes in truth

SH.content: no “absolute poem,” but date (beyond calendar/clocks), madness of “when,” unthinkable Einmal (once), terrifying ambiguity of shibboleth > sign of belonging (alliance), threat of discrimination (war)
SH.linkedContent: no “absolute poem,” but date (beyond calendar/clocks), madness of “when,” unthinkable Einmal (once), terrifying ambiguity of shibboleth > sign of belonging (alliance), threat of discrimination (war)

SH.content: “this = shibboleth”? go, know, this deictic, here > must distinguish btwn “the” shibboleth and “a” shibboleth
SH.linkedContent: “this = shibboleth”? go, know, this deictic, here > must distinguish btwn “the” shibboleth and “a” shibboleth

SH.content: anyone who experiences circumcision (body cut, shibboleth, blessing, purification) is a Jew
SH.linkedContent: anyone who experiences circumcision (body cut, shibboleth, blessing, purification) is a Jew

SH.content: displace literality of belonging if, w/ Judaism, nothing properly belongs, anyone or no one may be a Jew, Jew: no one’s name, the only one, no one’s circumcision
SH.linkedContent: displace literality of belonging if, w/ Judaism, nothing properly belongs, anyone or no one may be a Jew, Jew: no one’s name, the only one, no one’s circumcision

SH.content: the proper of the body, a place of circumcision
SH.linkedContent: the proper of the body, a place of circumcision

SH.content: circumcision of the word: an event of the body (from shibboleth to sibboleth)
SH.linkedContent: circumcision of the word: an event of the body (from shibboleth to sibboleth)

SH.content: because one can make use of shibboleth, it can be turned against oneself, the circumcised are proscribed, held at border, excluded, reduced to ashes, in the mere name
SH.linkedContent: because one can make use of shibboleth, it can be turned against oneself, the circumcised are proscribed, held at border, excluded, reduced to ashes, in the mere name

SH.content: how to guard against double edge of shibboleth? w/ “living Nothing in the heart,” perhaps

SH.content: every untranslatable space, pause, calls for and provokes translation > shibboleth merges completely w/ translation in its essential dimension
SH.linkedContent: every untranslatable space, pause, calls for and provokes translation > shibboleth merges completely w/ translation in its essential dimension

EL.content: does Scholem want shibboleth to get out of abyss (the improbable border, the desert) or to rush into it & be engulfed by it (pour s’y engouffrer)?
